subject: english
title: Reading Comprehension - Grade 6
content:
# Reading Comprehension - Grade 6

## Learning Objectives
By the end of this lesson, students will be able to:
- Master key concepts in Main Idea, Supporting Details, Inference, Context Clues
- Apply language skills in written and oral communication
- Analyze literary texts critically

## Introduction
This lesson focuses on Reading Comprehension, covering Main Idea, Supporting Details, Inference, Context Clues. Students will develop their English language
proficiency through reading, writing, speaking, and listening activities.

## Main Content
This section covers Main Idea, Supporting Details, Inference, Context Clues. Students will explore each topic through theoretical understanding and practical application.

## Language Focus
Grammar, vocabulary, and usage points

## Reading Passage
Selected passages for comprehension and analysis

## Writing Activities
1. M exercises
2. Creative writing tasks
3. Formal and informal writing practice

## Speaking and Listening
- Class discussions
- Presentations
- Pair and group work
- Listening comprehension exercises

## Assessment
Written assignments, oral presentations, comprehension tests, and portfolio work.

## Resources
- English textbook for Grade 6
- Literary texts
- Audio-visual materials
- Online resources
learning_outcomes: Analyze concepts related to Reading Comprehension
